articles.author: Ellise Shafer
articles.title: Martin Scorsese Urges Young Filmmakers to Reinvent Cinema in Streaming Age: ‘Content Is Something You Eat and Throw Away’ - Variety
articles.description: Martin Scorsese said the entertainment industry is in a 'period of reinventing' cinema during his Screen Talk at London Film Festival on Saturday.
articles.content: Martin Scorsese said the entertainment industry is in a “period of reinventing” cinema during his Screen Talk at the BFI London Film Festival on Saturday, urging young filmmakers to use new technolog… [+2730 chars]
